result.execSummary:
The defendant Paston Cade Novotny was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Child Pornography [Modifiers: Penalty - Possession of Child Pornography], a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.12(1m).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court believes defendant is ineligible to participate in the substance abuse program and challenge incarceration program.  If Department of Corrections allows him to participate, Court has no objection.

superMiscConds.notes:
Pay costs of count in the amount of $518.00.

Pay child pornography surcharge of $500.00 - 1 image @ $500.00 per image.
Obtain/maintain employment in an occupation approved by agent; not voluntarily quit employment without agent approval.

Register under Sex Offender Registry law.

Comply with any assessments, rules and no contacts per agent.

Pay supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.
